docs.snippet: The medal awarded in 1971 to the economist who created standard measures of national income and economic growth is on the auction block....
docs.lead_paragraph: The medal awarded in 1971 to the economist who created standard measures of national income and economic growth is on the auction block.
docs.abstract: Upcoming auction of Nobel prize won by economist Simon Kuznets in 1971 highlights difficulty of pricing an object with little market history; only handful of Nobel prizes have been auctioned in the past, with prices ranging from the low five figures to the millions; opening bid for Kuznets's medal will be $150,000, though it remains unclear whether his accomplishments are well-known enough to fetch a high price.

headline.main: Putting a Price on Simon Kuznets’s Nobel in Economics
headline.print_headline: The Challenge of Putting a Price on an Economist’s Nobel Medal

docs.snippet: The luxury brand ousted its chief executive, Patrizio di Marco, and his partner, Frida Giannini, its creative director. Her replacement left the fashion world asking, “Who?”...
docs.lead_paragraph: The luxury brand ousted its chief executive, Patrizio di Marco, and his partner, Frida Giannini, its creative director. Her replacement left the fashion world asking, “Who?”
docs.abstract: Fashion world figures express surprise at Gucci's decision to oust designer Frida Giannini and replace her with associate director Alessandro Michele; little-known Michele will make his runway debut in Milan at show that was intended as Giannini's last.

headline.main: At Gucci, a Messy Exit for One Designer Opens an Unlikely Door for Another
